select count(userid) totalRecord from registerinfo
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select count(ord_no) from order09
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select count(pd.on_no) from product_detail pd join product p on pd.pro_code=p.pro_code where pd.status> 1
and ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select * from (select * from ( select p.on_no, p.pro_code, p.pro_name, p.userid, p.status as pd_status, o.status, to_char(o.orderdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI') orderdate,to_char(p.writedate, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI') writedate from (select pd.on_no, pd.pro_code, p.pro_name, pd.userid, pd.status, pd.writedate from product_detail pd join product p on pd.pro_code=p.pro_code and pd.status=2) p join order09 o on p.on_no=o.on_no and p.userid=o.userid
and ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by on_no desc )
where rownum<=${nowPage*onePageRecord} order by on_no asc
)
where rownum<=${onePageRecord} order by on_no desc
where rownum<=${lastPageRecord} order by on_no desc
mapper.update: update order09 set status=status+1 where on_no=#{on_no}
mapper.select:
select * from (select * from ( select o.ord_no, o.pro_code, o.userid, o.ord_count, o.status, o.on_no, o.orderdate, o.ord_amount, p.pro_name from order09 o join product p on o.pro_code=p.pro_code
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by ord_no asc )
where rownum<=${nowPage*onePageRecord} order by ord_no desc
)
where rownum<=${onePageRecord} order by ord_no asc
where rownum<=${lastPageRecord} order by ord_no asc

select * from (select * from ( select rownum, a.username, a.userid, a.tel, a.email, a.rank, to_char(a.writedate,'YY-MM-DD HH:MI') writedate, a.report from (select username, userid, tel, email, rank, writedate, report from registerinfo order by username) a
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by username asc )
where rownum<=${nowPage*onePageRecord} order by username desc
)
where rownum<=${onePageRecord} order by username asc
where rownum<=${lastPageRecord} order by username asc

select userid, username, tel, email, writedate, rank from registerinfo
where rank>=1

select count(pro_code) totalRecord from product
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select * from (select * from ( select pro_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_stock, image, detailed, pro_total from product
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by pro_code desc)
where rownum<=${onePageRecord*nowPage} order by pro_code asc
)
where rownum<=${onePageRecord} order by pro_code desc
where rownum<=${lastPageRecord} order by pro_code desc
mapper.insert: insert into product(pro_code, pro_price, pro_stock, detailed, image, pro_name, pro_total) values(pro_code_sq.nextval, #{pro_price}, #{pro_stock}, #{detailed}, #{image}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_total})
mapper.select: select pro_code, pro_name, pro_total, pro_price, pro_stock, image, detailed from product where pro_code=#{pro_code}
mapper.update: update product set pro_name=#{pro_name}, pro_price=#{pro_price}, pro_total=#{pro_total}, pro_stock=#{pro_stock}, detailed = #{detailed} where pro_code=#{pro_code}
